Automatic.Description: The fire selector is stuck on a non-existent setting
Automatic.Explanation: Weapon variant with only a full-auto fire mode, featuring an increased fire rate but reduced ergonomics

Marksman.Description: To combat the high prices of ammunition, this weapon has been modified to remove its full-auto fire mode. As a result, it now excels in medium-distance engagements
Marksman.Explanation: Weapon variant with the fire mode changed to Single/Burst, featuring reduced recoil and no weapon malfunctions

Handy.Description: Due to changes in how you can hold the weapon, using it is now as natural as walking
Handy.Explanation: Weapon variant with significantly enhanced ergonomics, allowing for improved handling, faster aim transitions, and reduced fatigue during prolonged use

Unbreakable.Description:
Some famous guy from television used his miracle product to make this gun unbreakable
Now you can throw it into the sand without worrying about jams
~It even works underwater!~
Just... maybe don't cut it in half
Unbreakable.Explanation: Weapon variant immune to durability damage, overheating, and malfunctions

Karabin Spetsialniy.Description:
The KS-23 'Special Carbine' is a shotgun officially designated as a carbine by the Russian military
So we made even more of them
Karabin Spetsialniy.Explanation: A shotgun variant chambered in 23x75mmR, featuring a special 12-round magazine and no interclip reload-for that true carbine experience!

Assault Rifle.Description: "I want a refund! This weapon is way too big for me! B-but I like the caliber. Can you get me something smaller that can fit in my handbag?"
Assault Rifle.Explanation: Pistol chambered in 5.56x45mm NATO, compatible with all M4A1 magazines

Endless.Description:
Do you really need 250 or even 400 rounds in one raid? Probably not
But this weapon was built differentlyâ€¦ so here we are
Endless.Explanation: Weapon variant with a magazine that's heavy and bulky, but incredibly spacious
